text: Heydekrug may refer to places in former East Prussia: * Šilutė, now Lithuania, the site of Stalag Luft VI - a World War II German allied aircrew POW camp * Places now in Kaliningrad Oblast, Russia, the sites of the Battle of Königsberg at the Vistula Lagoon to the west of Königsberg: ** Groß-Heydekrug (now Vzmorye) ** Klein-Heydekrug (probably Cherepanovo) de:Heydekrug
title: Heydekrug
